Place 6 - Duff O'Dell
=====================

Email: [Duff O’Dell](mailto:dodell@grapevinetexas.gov "Duff O'Dell")  Duff ODell-Edit-201-229_pp (2) City Council
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Elected to Place 6 in 2014
* Term expires: 2026

Current Committees

* Council Facilities Committee
* Council Liaison – Animal Shelter Advisory Committee
* Council Liaison – Heritage Foundation Advisory Board
* Council Liaison – Senior Citizens Advisory Board
* Crime Control and Prevention District Board
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 1
* Tax Increment Financing District Reinvestment Zone No. 2
* Impact Fee Committee
* Industrial Development Corporation

Community Organization Service

* Grapevine Rotary Club – current member since 2005 and past President
* Grapevine Chamber of Commerce – current member since 1985 and past Board Director
* Women’s Division – current member since 1985 and past President
* Grapevine Historical Society – current member since 1985 and current President
* Grapevine Heritage Foundation – current member since 2005 and past Board Director
* Citizens Police Academy Alumni
* Leadership Grapevine Alumni
* Grapevine Wine Pouring Society founding member
* Bay View Club of Grapevine – current member since 2007 and past President
* GRACE – volunteer since 1985 and current Board Director
* Awards/Honors: D. E. Box Citizen of the Year, Rotarian of the Year, Ambassador of the Year, Woman of the Year, Don Raney Community Spirit Award, Angel of GRACE award

Other Areas of Local & Regional Interest

* Catholic Diocese of Fort Worth Advancement Foundation, former Director
* American Cancer Society – past Relay for Life steering committee
* Tarrant County College – Adult Education Mentor

Personal 

* Grapevine resident since 1985
* Married to Patrick O’Dell since 1975
* Retired Delta Air Lines and Premier Bank Texas

* [Online  
  Payments](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/386/epay.aspx)

* [Employment](https://agency.governmentjobs.com/grapevinetx/default.cfm)

* [Solid Waste  
  & Recycling](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/795)

* [Media](https://www.grapevinetexas.gov/1417)
